dcterms:description: A neat video-text dataset constructed from YouTube videos to facilitate the learning of basic game concepts in Minecraft. It includes filtered video clips and their corresponding transcripts, ensuring high correlation between the two.
dcterms:title: YouTube Dataset

dcterms:description: An internet-scale, multi-modal knowledge base of YouTube videos designed to facilitate learning in open-ended settings, providing a large dataset for training vision-language models.
dcterms:title: MineDojo

dcterms:creator: William H. Guss

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset of Minecraft demonstrations, containing player actions and corresponding labels, aimed at facilitating research in reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: MineRL

dcterms:creator: Linxi Fan
Guanzhi Wang

Ajay Mandlekar

dcterms:description: A video-text contrastive framework that utilizes internet-scale domain knowledge to provide auxiliary reward signals for reinforcement learning tasks.
dcterms:title: MineCLIP
